title: Mastery 6 Token?
body:
So, I play  {{champion:84}}  & reached level 5 w/ an S- as seasons highest grade. But apparently I didn't get my mastery token yet.

 Is there something else I'm forgetting to do?

replies.body: It's not possible to reach a token at the same time as reaching level 5.  You'll have to start the game already at level 5 to earn a token.  Let me know if that clears things up!
